title: Sizzle in red like Priyanka Chopra Jonas
text:
Next Story : Indulge in luxurious oils with Lakme Salon

Let’s just take a moment to admire Priyanka Chopra Jonas as she pulls off the most risky colour on her makeup, dress, and accessories. Red isn’t as easy to work with for an all-over fashion and beauty look, but this diva shows up with such a glamorous approach that it awes us. Slaying in a red lace Oscar de la Renta number and red gemstone earrings, Priyanka opted for a bold red lip and gold-toned lids. Keeping it minimal yet glam is the way to go. If you want to achieve the same level of glamour in red like the gorgeous star, follow this simple decode.• Follow a CTM routine.• Exfoliate your lips and swipe on a lip balm.• Apply an illuminating primer to your face.• Blend a cream foundation on your face and neck.• Conceal blemishes and under-eye area with an illuminating concealer.• Dab a gold-toned eyeshadow on your lids and lower lash line.• Softly smudge brown kohl on the upper lash line.• Apply loads of lengthening mascara to your lashes.• Fill in your eyebrows with an eyebrow pencil and blend it in with a spoolie brush.• Use a gold-toned highlighter on the high points of your face such as the cheekbones, brow bones, bridge of the nose, Cupid’s bow, and temples.• Apply an apricot blush to your cheeks.• Pick a garnet shade of lipstick in a velvet matte formula and apply it to your lips.• Set the look with a spritz of makeup setting spray.
description: Channel that ‘lady in red’ avatar like the gorgeous Priyanka Chopra Jonas with this nifty makeup decode.
